content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1141,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、あっ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah...?\""},{"lineNumber":1142,"originalJapaneseLine":"サーナキアが、クリンの肩を掴んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sarnakia grabbed Kurin's shoulder."},{"lineNumber":1143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスを探してるんだが。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm looking for Rance."},{"lineNumber":1144,"originalJapaneseLine":"　来たな、ここに？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Did he come here?\""},{"lineNumber":1145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知りませんけど？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know.\""},{"lineNumber":1146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつは……ったく。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That guy... geez."},{"lineNumber":1147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何故みんな、あいつをかばうんだか……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Why does everyone protect him...?\""},{"lineNumber":1148,"originalJapaneseLine":"サーナキアはため息を吐いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sarnakia sighed."},{"lineNumber":1149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいか、必要な事なんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen, this is important."},{"lineNumber":1150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴はどこだ？　かばっても無駄だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" Where is he? It's useless to protect him.\""},{"lineNumber":1151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知りませんけど？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know.\""},{"lineNumber":1152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":1153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":1154,"originalJapaneseLine":"（な、なんて純粋な……","translatedEnglishLine":"(W-what purity..."},{"lineNumber":1155,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やましい所ひとつ無い、眼……！）","translatedEnglishLine":" Eyes that hold not a single wicked thought...!)"},{"lineNumber":1156,"originalJapaneseLine":"（こんなに……こんなに完璧に、嘘をつけるものか？","translatedEnglishLine":"(Can someone really lie this perfectly... this completely?"},{"lineNumber":1157,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクが……見間違えたのでは……？）","translatedEnglishLine":" Could it be that I... was mistaken?)"},{"lineNumber":1158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お掃除、していいですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"May I continue cleaning?\""},{"lineNumber":1159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あぁ。すまなかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah. Sorry about that.\""},{"lineNumber":1160,"originalJapaneseLine":"サーナキアが手を離すと、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Sarnakia let go of her hand,"},{"lineNumber":1161,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリンは掃除に戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurin returned to cleaning."},{"lineNumber":1162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「隣の部屋と見間違えたか……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did I mistake it for the next room...? "},{"lineNumber":1163,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だとするとすぐに追わねば！　御免！」","translatedEnglishLine":" If so, I must follow quickly! Excuse me!\""},{"lineNumber":1164,"originalJapaneseLine":"……………………","translatedEnglishLine":"................"},{"lineNumber":1165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふー、行ったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, he left."},{"lineNumber":1166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははは、サーナキアめ、愚かな」","translatedEnglishLine":" Hahaha, that Sarnakia is foolish.\""},{"lineNumber":1167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっ、さっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sa, sa...\""},{"lineNumber":1168,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、メイドちゃん。ご苦労だったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, maid-chan. Good work.\""},{"lineNumber":1169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":1170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かクリンちゃんだったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was Kurin-chan, right?"},{"lineNumber":1171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いい名演ぶりだったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" You gave a good performance.\""},{"lineNumber":1172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":1173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"....................\""},{"lineNumber":1174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クリンちゃん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kurin-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":1175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、お客様ですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, are you a guest?"},{"lineNumber":1176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もしかして、ご到着が前倒しに……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Did you possibly arrive earlier...?\""},{"lineNumber":1177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違う」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No.\""},{"lineNumber":1178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、むむむむ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mu, mumu...\""},{"lineNumber":1179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう難しい事を言っているつもりはないのだがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not trying to say anything difficult."},{"lineNumber":1180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呑めぬか」","translatedEnglishLine":" Can't you accept it?\""},{"lineNumber":1181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………なんだなんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What, what is this?"},{"lineNumber":1182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てるさんと……クリン？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Teru-san and... Kurin?\""},{"lineNumber":1183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わ、睨み合ってますよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-they're glaring at each other..."},{"lineNumber":1184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てるさん、ちょっと怖いです……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Teru-san looks a bit scary...\""},{"lineNumber":1185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「些か難しい問題でございまして」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a somewhat difficult problem."},{"lineNumber":1186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ビスケッタさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh, Biscetta-san."},{"lineNumber":1187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何がどうした」","translatedEnglishLine":" What's going on?\""},{"lineNumber":1188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当城では、掃除に関しては、熱意を買って","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In this castle, regarding cleaning, due to Kurin's enthusiasm,"},{"lineNumber":1189,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クリンにある程度の裁量を与えています」","translatedEnglishLine":" we have given Kurin a certain degree of discretion.\""},{"lineNumber":1190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ところが、毛利てる様が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, Teru Mouri-sama,"},{"lineNumber":1191,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分も掃除をさせて欲しいと」","translatedEnglishLine":" wishes to do the cleaning herself.\""},{"lineNumber":1192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー……てるさん、お掃除得意でしたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... Teru-san is good at cleaning, after all...\""},{"lineNumber":1193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「したいならさせてやればいいじゃないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If she wants to, then let her do it."},{"lineNumber":1194,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手間も省けるだろ？」","translatedEnglishLine":" It'll save some trouble, right?\""},{"lineNumber":1195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「憚りながらご主人様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With all due respect, Master,"},{"lineNumber":1196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メイドとしては、職分を侵されるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":" to have one's role infringed upon as a maid"},{"lineNumber":1197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　己の誇りを踏みにじられるも同義でございます」","translatedEnglishLine":" is equivalent to having one's pride trampled upon.\""},{"lineNumber":1198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前の仕事は失格だから客の私にやらせろ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your work is a failure, so let me, a guest, do it instead,"},{"lineNumber":1199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その方がマシだ……","translatedEnglishLine":" it's better that way..."},{"lineNumber":1200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういう宣告と取られても、やむなき事かと」","translatedEnglishLine":" Even if it is taken as such a declaration, it can't be helped.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアが、クリンの肩を掴んだ。
何故みんな、あいつをかばうんだか……」
サーナキアはため息を吐いた。
奴はどこだ？　かばっても無駄だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is he? It's useless to protect him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やましい所ひとつ無い、眼……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eyes that hold not a single wicked thought...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こんなに……こんなに完璧に、嘘をつけるものか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Can someone really lie this perfectly... this completely?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクが……見間違えたのでは……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that I... was mistaken?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアが手を離すと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Sarnakia let go of her hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリンは掃除に戻った。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did I mistake it for the next room...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だとするとすぐに追わねば！　御免！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so, I must follow quickly! Excuse me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、サーナキアめ、愚かな」
「おう、メイドちゃん。ご苦労だったな」
「確かクリンちゃんだったな。
いい名演ぶりだったぞ」
もしかして、ご到着が前倒しに……」
「そう難しい事を言っているつもりはないのだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not trying to say anything difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるさん、ちょっと怖いです……」
「些か難しい問題でございまして」
「当城では、掃除に関しては、熱意を買って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this castle, regarding cleaning, due to Kurin's enthusiasm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリンにある程度の裁量を与えています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have given Kurin a certain degree of discretion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分も掃除をさせて欲しいと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wishes to do the cleaning herself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー……てるさん、お掃除得意でしたね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... Teru-san is good at cleaning, after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「したいならさせてやればいいじゃないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If she wants to, then let her do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドとしては、職分を侵されるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to have one's role infringed upon as a maid

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の誇りを踏みにじられるも同義でございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is equivalent to having one's pride trampled upon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の仕事は失格だから客の私にやらせろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your work is a failure, so let me, a guest, do it instead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう宣告と取られても、やむなき事かと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it is taken as such a declaration, it can't be helped."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this castle, regarding cleaning, due to Kurin's enthusiasm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリンにある程度の裁量を与えています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have given Kurin a certain degree of discretion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分も掃除をさせて欲しいと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wishes to do the cleaning herself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー……てるさん、お掃除得意でしたね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... Teru-san is good at cleaning, after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「したいならさせてやればいいじゃないか。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドとしては、職分を侵されるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to have one's role infringed upon as a maid

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の誇りを踏みにじられるも同義でございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is equivalent to having one's pride trampled upon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の仕事は失格だから客の私にやらせろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your work is a failure, so let me, a guest, do it instead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう宣告と取られても、やむなき事かと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it is taken as such a declaration, it can't be helped."
